summary: Completed frontend testing of keyboard shortcuts implementation for iPOS POS screen. All requested features are working correctly.
passed_tests: Login with admin/admin123 credentials works correctly
F1 shortcut shows help toast with complete keyboard shortcuts list
F12 shortcut opens 'Kërko Artikullin' (Product Search) dialog
F6 shortcut opens 'Dokumentet e Fundit' (Recent Documents) dialog
F4 shortcut opens 'Fatura A4 - Preview' dialog (when cart has items)
F2 shortcut opens 'Shtyp faturën' payment dialog (when cart has items)
F9 shortcut opens payment dialog (alternative to F2, when cart has items)
Visual label 'F6' visible on Dokumentin button
Visual label 'F12' visible on Kërko artikullin button
Visual label 'Del' visible on Fshij artikullin button
Visual label 'F4' visible on Printo A4 button
Visual label 'F2' visible on Shtyp button
context_for_next_testing_agent: All keyboard shortcuts (F1, F2, F4, F6, F9, F12) are working correctly. Visual labels (F2, F4, F6, F12, Del) are visible on the corresponding buttons in the POS screen. Login flow requires clicking 'Kyçu si Administrator' first, then entering username/password. Cash drawer must be opened before testing cart-dependent shortcuts (F2, F4, F9).

keyboard_shortcuts_tested.F1: Shows help toast with all keyboard shortcuts - WORKING
keyboard_shortcuts_tested.F2: Opens payment dialog (requires cart items) - WORKING
keyboard_shortcuts_tested.F4: Opens A4 Invoice preview (requires cart items) - WORKING
keyboard_shortcuts_tested.F9: Opens payment dialog (alternative to F2, requires cart items) - WORKING
